body: Bruh the husband didn’t even know that the guy was fucking his wife
@FresshLikeLettuce Only in NTR logic. Doesn't happen like that in real life.
I already came back here twice and I'm patiently waiting for the translation
Ah, another beautiful creation! Very nice.

It was a shame that it is like the other story a BF with a mind and not like usual that it is simply ignored that your girlfriend is cheating on you
But it was still interesting
well do you see guys? a BIG DICK will OVERWRITTE ANY FEELINGS OF LOVE THAT A SLUT COULD HAVE FOR THEY'RE  1-5 YEARS  DATING PARTNER

Ahh... Now THIS is an actual problem. He just "BAM BAM END" leaving her hanging. And then, there's that other guy who started slowly with foreplays and whatsoever. don't be like the MC, be that other guy if you want to have sex. Well, seems like the MC knows how to play too looking at the end of the chapter, but oh well... This is an NTR story anyway.

Well at least we know the lol of writing we can get from this author, dumb easy whores, annoying assholes Chads, and somewhat semi competent MC. I don't think there's need to be a debate here, she wasn't satisfied with the boyfriend so she cheated rinse repeat same as last time, the only difference here is that she knows how to cover her tracks at least.
I would packed up and left her there no money no clothing...nothing
Can't wait for the next war, lol. Man, this author likes this type of NTR, huh? Well at least this time we got the usual idiot MC.
